Install Keras and Tensorflow

Source: R/helpers_proba.R
install_keras.Rd

Stripped back version of keras::install_keras.

install_keras(
  method = "auto",
  conda = "auto",
  pip = FALSE,
  install_tensorflow = FALSE
)

Arguments

method, conda, pip

See reticulate::py_install.
install_tensorflow

If TRUE installs the dependency tensorflow package as well.
